title: Kayakalp Global - Best quality treatment for Vitiligo, Psoriasis & Fungal infection
description: Kayakalp Global offers Best Vitiligo & Psoriasis Treatment in India at Lowest Cost with Expert Doctor's Consultation.
cleaned_text: Owing to its unique approach of using both modern as well as traditional medicine in order to treat the patient, Kayakalp Global has positioned itself as the leading Vitiligo and Psoriasis hospital in India. Headed by Dr. Shailender Dhawan, Kayakalp brings a unique model of integrative medicine to the world, by leveraging both Ayurveda and Allopathy. Treatment provided consists of both internal and external ointments and creams.
